newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Altera started as a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Altera started as a buy.

text.p: -- J.P. Morgan analyst Terry Ragsdale said in a research note he initiated coverage of Altera Corp with a buy recommendation and 12-month price target of $73 per share.
-- Shares rose 5/8 to 59 in early Nasdaq trade.
-- "Altera is the second largest and fastest-growing player in programmable logic, one of the most attractive segments in the entire semiconductor industry," Ragsdale said.
-- Estimated 1996 earnings are $2.26 per share and 1997 is $2.89 per share.
